question: 由来
sourceMnemonic: What's the <kanji>reason</kanji> that something <kanji>come</kanji>s into being? Its <vocabulary>origin</vocabulary>, of course. Nothing can come into the world without a <vocabulary>source</vocabulary>, because it's always <vocabulary>coming from</vocabulary> somewhere.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
You didn't learn this reading for <ja>由</ja> so here's a mnemonic to help you:

The best way to get close to the <vocabulary>origin</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>source</vocabulary> of something is to move into a <reading>yu</reading>rt (<ja>ゆ</ja>). Yurts are easy to move around, so you can always get close to the source, wherever that may be.
